page.title: 05 EDUCATION
page.content:
EDUCATION IN GOREBRIDGE
GREENHALL HIGH SCHOOL
IN YEARS 5 AND 6 PUPILS FOLLOW SCOTTISH CERTIFICATE OF EDUCATION HIGHER GRADE AND CERTIFICATE OF 6TH YEAR STUDIES OR CONTINUE S.C.E. ORDINARY GRADE COURSES.SUBJECTS STUDIED ARE ENGLISH,MATHS,HISTORY. GEOGRAPHY BIOLOGY FRENCH CHEMISTRY GERMAN TECHNICAL DRAWING MODERN STUDIES FOOD AND NUTRITION PHYSICS FRENCH SECRETARIAL STUDIES.PUPILS FOLLOW AN INDIVIDUAL TIMETABLE AT THIS STAGE AND EVERY EFFORT IS MADE TO ALLOW PUPILS TO STUDY THE SUBJECTS OF THEIR OWN CHOICE.HELP AND SUPPORT IS PROVIDED FOR THOSE WITH LEARNING DIFFICULTIES IN ENGLISH AND MATHS. THIS HELP CAN EITHER BE GIVEN IN THE CLASS OR ON AN INDIVIDUAL BASIS.
